member.name: T:Encrypter.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Encrypter.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Encrypter.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Utils.modUtils.ReadFile(System.String,System.IO.FileShare)
member.summary: Reads a file at the given path into a byte array
member.param: The path of the file to be read
Determines how the file will be shared by processes
member.returns: The contents of the file as a byte array

member.name: M:Utils.modUtils.SaveFile(System.String,System.Byte[],System.IO.FileShare)
member.summary: Saves a file at the given path with the contents of the byte array
member.param: The path of the file to be saved
The byte array containing the file contents
Determines how the file will be shared by processes
